```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
x = matrix(rnorm(10*2), ncol=2)
y = c(rep(-1,5), rep(1,5)) # The class vector
x[y==1,]=x[y==1,] + 1
```

```{r}
df = data.frame(x,y)
df
```
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=X1, X2), color=(3-y)) +
  geom_point(size=2, shape=23) + 
  xlim(-2, 2) + 
  ylim(-2, 2) # + geom_jitter()
```
